hoaamdescription: Hoa Am is the first game project I made when I started learning Unreal Engine. The story of Hoa Am is set against an urban legend of a high school where, in the 10th month, no one is allowed to stay at school after 6 pm.
hoaamdescription2: The game's story begins when a group of students decides to break the law and climb into school at 6 pm. They are then separated and fall into an endless time loop where strange phenomena constantly occur. As secrets are gradually revealed, how can they find a way to survive and escape the school.
citydescription: This project is a game level which is built according to the medieval city theme in RPG games using Blender modeling, Quixel texture and lighting in Unreal Engine 4
citydescription2: The level include many type of models, AI citizen movement, weather, animals, .... You can move around, climb around the city throw a chateracter to wandering over the world.
rpgdescription: This project is a rpg complicate combat system using Unreal Engine 4 inspired by the combat system of the Souls game series.
rpgdescription2: The combat system includes many functions like: assassination, light attack combo, heavy attack combat, many kinds of weapons combat type, dodging, posion health, AI enemy behavior, etc ...
